title: import path check in Go 1.4 rc1: git and https
body:
What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. clone a repository in your gopath with the Git protocol instead of https
(git@github.com:pierrre/imageserver.git)
2. update your $GOPATH: go get -v -u ...

What happened?

I get an error:
imports github.com/pierrre/imageserver/cache:
/home/pierre/Go/src/github.com/pierrre/imageserver is from
git@github.com:pierrre/imageserver.git, should be from
https://github.com/pierrre/imageserver

What should have happened instead?
It should work like Go 1.3.3
